content.d: Why are you in my room, Shioriko-chan!?
I'm sorry for the surprise. I happened to run into Umi-san while I was buying Japanese sweets at Homura, and she asked me...
Yes. She has something to do today and can’t help you with your homework, so she wanted me to watch over you instead...
What!? Umi-chan, seriously... I mean, sorry, Shioriko-chan, you can go home. I'll be fine!
Will you actually do your homework if I leave?
Uh... well... I’ll do it after a short break, yeah... Just a really quick breather, okay?
Then please, go ahead and take a break. I’ll keep a close watch until you finish your homework.
